snippet.title: Cryptic Route Horror Game Trailer
snippet.description:
Hello, This is Callmerat Games.

The game I've developed this time is "Cryptic Route",  a multi-ending horror game where you drive through a rainy, dark forest relying on navigation.

The release date is scheduled for the end of June. 

The demo of the horror game Cryptic Route is now available on Steam. I would greatly appreciate your interest.
🔗https://store.steampowered.com/app/2925010/Cryptic_Route/

On itch.io, anyone can download the demo quickly and easily without logging in.
🔗https://callmeratgames.itch.io/cryptic-route

Thank you. I'll do my best.

For Best horror game.

#horrorgaming 
#horror
